  • Method Details

    • getLessons

      @GetMapping public List<LessonDto> getLessons​(@RequestBody SearchFilterDto searchFilterDto)
      Finding and filtering lessons
      Parameters:
      searchFilterDto - filter parameters: status - filter by status (is the lesson started, finished and etc), teacherName - filter by teacher name, teacherSurname - filter by teacher surname, theme - filter by lesson theme, minRating - find lesson with rating not less than given, online - find online / offline lessons, address - filter by address, free - find only free lessons, minCost - find lessons with cost not less than given, maxCost - find lessons with cost not greater than given, numberOfPlaces - find lessons with number of places left not less than given, individual - find individual / group lessons, from - find lessons starting after given date, to - find lessons finishing before given date
      Returns:
      filtered list of lessons

    • addLesson

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADD\')") @PutMapping public LessonDto addLesson​(@RequestBody LessonDto lessonDto)
      Parameters:
      lessonDto - lesson data
      Returns:
      added to database lesson data

    • editLesson

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'EDIT\')") @PostMapping("/{id}") public LessonDto editLesson​(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody LessonDto lessonDto)
      Parameters:
      id - id of the edited lesson
      lessonDto - data that should be edited
      Returns:
      edited lesson data

    • denyLesson

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'EDIT\')") @PostMapping("/{id}/deny") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> denyLesson​(@PathVariable Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - id of the lesson that should be denied
      Returns:
      cancellation success message

      Parameters:
      id - id of the lesson that should be deleted
      Returns:
      successful deletion message

    • getSubscriptions

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'SUBSCRIBE\')") @GetMapping("/subscriptions") public List<LessonDto> getSubscriptions()
      Returns:
      list of lessons to which the student is subscribed

    • subscribeLesson

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'SUBSCRIBE\')") @PostMapping("/{id}/subscribe") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> subscribeLesson​(@PathVariable Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - id of the lesson to which the student should be subscribed
      Returns:
      message about subscription success

    • unsubscribeLesson

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'SUBSCRIBE\')") @PostMapping("/{id}/unsubscribe") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> unsubscribeLesson​(@PathVariable Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - id of the lesson to which the student should be unsubscribed
      Returns:
      message about success of canceling subscription

    • countSalary

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'GET_SALARY\')") @GetMapping("/{id}/salary") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> countSalary​(@PathVariable Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - id of the lesson for which the teacher's salary should be counted
      Returns:
      message about counted salary

    • updateLessonStatuses

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'EDIT\')") @PostMapping("/{id}/update_status") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> updateLessonStatuses​(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam(required=false) @DateTimeFormat(pattern="dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm") LocalDateTime currentTime)
      Parameters:
      id - id of the lesson which status should be updated
      currentTime - time according to which the status should be updated
      Returns:
      message about success of status update
